name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Proficient in troubleshooting, scripting, and networking, bringing 13+ years of expertise as a Full Stack Developer with a strong background in both Windows and Linux environments. Skilled in resolving complex issues and delivering top-tier customer communication, with a proven ability to plan and organize effectively. Experienced in deploying applications with robust REST API integrations and Python development. 
Demonstrated success in building high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept in AI/ML technologies and deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure** with architectural best practices, including microservices and CI/CD pipelines. Well-versed in compliance-driven development in alignment with relevant standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
